positive_examples: This is an example of aerial bombardment.
The aerial bombardment demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed aerial bombardment in this context.
A typical case of aerial bombardment would involve these features.
The concept of aerial bombardment applies here.
A military assault conducted from aircraft using bombs, missiles, or other airborne weapons.
negative_examples: This is an example of direct assault, not aerial bombardment.
This represents military assault in general.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: DirectAssault, or other types of MilitaryAssault

definition: An attack using aircraft to drop bombs on ground targets.
